page.title: 15THE MANOR HOUSE
page.content: WITH THE NORMAN CONQUEST OF 1066 THE MANOR HOUSE WAS DISPOSSESED,AND GIVEN TO THE BISHOPS OF LINCOLN FOR OVER 400 YEARS UNTIL THE REIGN OF EDWARD THE VI WHEN IT WAS SOLD BY BISHOP HOLBEACH TO THE DUKE OF SOMERSET.WHO WAS ACCUSED OF TREASON AND THE MANOR WAS GIVEN BACK TO THE CROWN.QUEEN MARY 1 WHO GRANTED THE MANOR TO EDWARD,LORD CLINTON,WHO SOLD IT TO THE CARRE FAMILY.THEY HELD IT UNTIL 1686 WHEN FOLLOWING THE DEATH IN 1684 OF SIR ROBERT CARRE AND THE LAND BARONET,IT WAS PASSED TO HIS DAUGHTER,ISABELLA WHO MARRIED JOHN HERVEY.SINCE THEN IT HAS REMAINED THE PROPERTY OF THE EARLS OF BRISTOL. {BY THE WILLIAM ALVEY SCHOOL}
